posts.post_title: FS: N172 Amos Rusie Old Judge
posts.post_content:
Thought I'd uncovered all of my OJ's, but came across this beauty a couple weeks ago.

N172 Amos Rusie Old Judge: $SOLD

Front looks great as you can see. Back has blue stains and "CW Church" stamp.

Payments accepted via PPFF or Check. First come first serve.

Please send a PM if interested.
